categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A blockade of the planet Gobindi by the Galactic Empire occurred in 0 ABY under the pretense of heavy pirate activity. In reality, the Empire was after the four Rebels who had arrived to spy on the Mah Dala Infirmary a few days prior. The Rebels escaped three weeks later after shutting down the infirmary's bioweapon project.
